Marianna, FL Population by Year

In 2023, the population of Marianna was 7,294, a 0.07% decrease year-by-year from 2022. Previously, in 2022, Marianna's population was 7,299, an increase of 6.99% compared to a population of 6,822 in 2021.

By Neilsberg Research

Updated Aug 1, 2024

Marianna, FL population between 2000 and 2023

Over the last 20 plus years, between 2000 and 2023, population of Marianna increased by 906. In this period, the peak population was 7,551 in the year 2010. The numbers suggest that the population has already reached its peak and is showing a trend of decline.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Marianna, FL population from 2000 to 2023

From 2000 to 2010, Marianna's population increased by 1,163 (18.21%), according to Census Bureau's Population Estimates Program. For the same period, the rate of growth for the United States was 9.63%.

From 2010 to 2020, Marianna's population decreased by 1,266 (16.77%), according to Census Bureau's Population Estimates Program. For the same period, the rate of growth for the United States was 7.18% .

After the COVID19 pandemic and, between the year 2020 and 2023, Marianna's population increased by 1,009 (16.05%).For the same period, the rate of growth for the United States was 1.02%.

FIGURE 1

Marianna's population from 2000 to 2023.

The estimated population at the end of 2023 was 7,294.

Between the year 2000 and 2023, Marianna's population peaked in year 2010 at 7,551.

Between the year 2000 and 2023, Marianna's population was lowest in year 2019 at 5,763.

Marianna, FL annual population growth rate

Between the years 2000 and 2023, i.e. 23 annual cycles, the population of Marianna grew year by year for 10 years and declined for 13 years.

From 2000 to 2023, Marianna had an average annual population growth rate of 0.62% per year. Overall the population grew 14.18% between 2000 and 2023.

FIGURE 2

Marianna annual population growth rate

The average annual growth rate from 2000 to 2023 was 0.62% per year.

From 2009 to 2010 Marianna population grew the most, with an increase of 1,211 people (a 19.10% year-on-year increase)..

From 2018 to 2019 Marianna population experienced the most significant decrease, with a decline of 1,285 people (a 18.23% year-on-year decline).

Things to know

Is Marianna, FL population increasing or decreasing?

According to the latest data from U.S. Census Bureau's population estimates, Marianna's population increased by 472 between 2021 and 2023. The increase was 477 (decreased) between 2021 and 2022; and decrease of 5 (0.07%) between 2022 and 2023.

How has the population of Marianna, FL changed in the last 10 years?

Between 2013 and 2023, population of Marianna decreased by 183 (2.45%). The population was highest at 7,413 in the year 2014 and lowest at 5,763 in the year 2019. Overall the average growth rate witnessed for the last 10 years was 0.04%.

About this dataset

Context

The dataset tabulates the Marianna population over the last 20 plus years. It lists the population for each year, along with the year on year change in population, as well as the change in percentage terms for each year. The dataset can be utilized to understand the population change of Marianna across the last two decades. For example, using this dataset, we can identify if the population is declining or increasing. If there is a change, when the population peaked, or if it is still growing and has not reached its peak. We can also compare the trend with the overall trend of United States population over the same period of time.

Key observations

In 2023, the population of Marianna was 7,294, a 0.07% decrease year-by-year from 2022. Previously, in 2022, Marianna population was 7,299, an increase of 6.99% compared to a population of 6,822 in 2021. Over the last 20 plus years, between 2000 and 2023, population of Marianna increased by 906. In this period, the peak population was 7,551 in the year 2010. The numbers suggest that the population has already reached its peak and is showing a trend of decline. Source: U.S. Census Bureau Population Estimates Program (PEP).

Content

When available, the data consists of estimates from the U.S. Census Bureau Population Estimates Program (PEP).

Data Coverage:

From 2000 to 2023

Variables / Data Columns

Year: This column displays the data year (Measured annually and for years 2000 to 2023)

Population: The population for the specific year for the Marianna is shown in this column.

Year on Year Change: This column displays the change in Marianna population for each year compared to the previous year.

Change in Percent: This column displays the year on year change as a percentage. Please note that the sum of all percentages may not equal one due to rounding of values.

Good to know

Margin of Error

Data in the dataset are based on the estimates and are subject to sampling variability and thus a margin of error. Neilsberg Research recommends using caution when presening these estimates in your research.
